00075 /*************************** Clear Transformation ****************************/
00076 
00077 /* clear location of object */
00078 static void object_clear_loc(Object *ob)
00079 {
00080     /* clear location if not locked */
00081     if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCX)==0)
00082         ob->loc[0]= ob->dloc[0]= 0.0f;
00083     if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCY)==0)
00084         ob->loc[1]= ob->dloc[1]= 0.0f;
00085     if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCZ)==0)
00086         ob->loc[2]= ob->dloc[2]= 0.0f;
00087 }
00088 
00089 /* clear rotation of object */
00090 static void object_clear_rot(Object *ob)
00091 {
00092     /* clear rotations that aren't locked */
00093     if (ob->protectflag & (OB_LOCK_ROTX|OB_LOCK_ROTY|OB_LOCK_ROTZ|OB_LOCK_ROTW)) {
00094         if (ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROT4D) {
00095             /* perform clamping on a component by component basis */
00096             if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
00097                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTW) == 0)
00098                     ob->rotAngle= ob->drotAngle= 0.0f;
00099                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTX) == 0)
00100                     ob->rotAxis[0]= ob->drotAxis[0]= 0.0f;
00101                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTY) == 0)
00102                     ob->rotAxis[1]= ob->drotAxis[1]= 0.0f;
00103                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTZ) == 0)
00104                     ob->rotAxis[2]= ob->drotAxis[2]= 0.0f;
00105                     
00106                 /* check validity of axis - axis should never be 0,0,0 (if so, then we make it rotate about y) */
00107                 if (IS_EQF(ob->rotAxis[0], ob->rotAxis[1]) && IS_EQF(ob->rotAxis[1], ob->rotAxis[2]))
00108                     ob->rotAxis[1] = 1.0f;
00109                 if (IS_EQF(ob->drotAxis[0], ob->drotAxis[1]) && IS_EQF(ob->drotAxis[1], ob->drotAxis[2]))
00110                     ob->drotAxis[1]= 1.0f;
00111             }
00112             else if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_QUAT) {
00113                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTW) == 0)
00114                     ob->quat[0]= ob->dquat[0]= 1.0f;
00115                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTX) == 0)
00116                     ob->quat[1]= ob->dquat[1]= 0.0f;
00117                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTY) == 0)
00118                     ob->quat[2]= ob->dquat[2]= 0.0f;
00119                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTZ) == 0)
00120                     ob->quat[3]= ob->dquat[3]= 0.0f;
00121                     
00122                 // TODO: does this quat need normalizing now?
00123             }
00124             else {
00125                 /* the flag may have been set for the other modes, so just ignore the extra flag... */
00126                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTX) == 0)
00127                     ob->rot[0]= ob->drot[0]= 0.0f;
00128                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTY) == 0)
00129                     ob->rot[1]= ob->drot[1]= 0.0f;
00130                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTZ) == 0)
00131                     ob->rot[2]= ob->drot[2]= 0.0f;
00132             }
00133         }
00134         else {
00135             /* perform clamping using euler form (3-components) */
00136             // FIXME: deltas are not handled for these cases yet...
00137             float eul[3], oldeul[3], quat1[4] = {0};
00138             
00139             if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_QUAT) {
00140                 copy_qt_qt(quat1, ob->quat);
00141                 quat_to_eul(oldeul, ob->quat);
00142             }
00143             else if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
00144                 axis_angle_to_eulO(oldeul, EULER_ORDER_DEFAULT, ob->rotAxis, ob->rotAngle);
00145             }
00146             else {
00147                 copy_v3_v3(oldeul, ob->rot);
00148             }
00149             
00150             eul[0]= eul[1]= eul[2]= 0.0f;
00151             
00152             if (ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTX)
00153                 eul[0]= oldeul[0];
00154             if (ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTY)
00155                 eul[1]= oldeul[1];
00156             if (ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_ROTZ)
00157                 eul[2]= oldeul[2];
00158             
00159             if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_QUAT) {
00160                 eul_to_quat(ob->quat, eul);
00161                 /* quaternions flip w sign to accumulate rotations correctly */
00162                 if ((quat1[0]<0.0f && ob->quat[0]>0.0f) || (quat1[0]>0.0f && ob->quat[0]<0.0f)) {
00163                     mul_qt_fl(ob->quat, -1.0f);
00164                 }
00165             }
00166             else if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
00167                 eulO_to_axis_angle(ob->rotAxis, &ob->rotAngle,eul, EULER_ORDER_DEFAULT);
00168             }
00169             else {
00170                 copy_v3_v3(ob->rot, eul);
00171             }
00172         }
00173     }                        // Duplicated in source/blender/editors/armature/editarmature.c
00174     else { 
00175         if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_QUAT) {
00176             unit_qt(ob->quat);
00177             unit_qt(ob->dquat);
00178         }
00179         else if (ob->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
00180             unit_axis_angle(ob->rotAxis, &ob->rotAngle);
00181             unit_axis_angle(ob->drotAxis, &ob->drotAngle);
00182         }
00183         else {
00184             zero_v3(ob->rot);
00185             zero_v3(ob->drot);
00186         }
00187     }
00188 }
00189 
00190 /* clear scale of object */
00191 static void object_clear_scale(Object *ob)
00192 {
00193     /* clear scale factors which are not locked */
00194     if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_SCALEX)==0) {
00195         ob->dscale[0]= 1.0f;
00196         ob->size[0]= 1.0f;
00197     }
00198     if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_SCALEY)==0) {
00199         ob->dscale[1]= 1.0f;
00200         ob->size[1]= 1.0f;
00201     }
00202     if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_SCALEZ)==0) {
00203         ob->dscale[2]= 1.0f;
00204         ob->size[2]= 1.0f;
00205     }
00206 }

00208 /* --------------- */
00209 
00210 /* generic exec for clear-transform operators */
00211 static int object_clear_transform_generic_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, 
00212         void (*clear_func)(Object*), const char default_ksName[])
00213 {
00214     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00215     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00216     KeyingSet *ks;
00217     
00218     /* sanity checks */
00219     if (ELEM(NULL, clear_func, default_ksName)) {
00220         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Programming error: missing clear transform func or Keying Set Name");
00221         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00222     }
00223     
00224     /* get KeyingSet to use */
00225     ks = ANIM_get_keyingset_for_autokeying(scene, default_ksName);
00226     
00227     /* operate on selected objects only if they aren't in weight-paint mode 
00228      * (so that object-transform clearing won't be applied at same time as bone-clearing)
00229      */
00230     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) 
00231     {
00232         if (!(ob->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT)) {
00233             /* run provided clearing function */
00234             clear_func(ob);
00235 
00236             ED_autokeyframe_object(C, scene, ob, ks);
00237 
00238             /* tag for updates */
00239             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00240         }
00241     }
00242     CTX_DATA_END;
00243     
00244     /* this is needed so children are also updated */
00245     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00246 
00247     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00248 
00249     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00250 }

00255 static int object_location_clear_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00256 {
00257     return object_clear_transform_generic_exec(C, op, object_clear_loc, ANIM_KS_LOCATION_ID);
00258 }

00260 void OBJECT_OT_location_clear(wmOperatorType *ot)
00261 {
00262     /* identifiers */
00263     ot->name = "Clear Location";
00264     ot->description = "Clear the object's location";
00265     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_location_clear";
00266     
00267     /* api callbacks */
00268     ot->exec = object_location_clear_exec;
00269     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00270     
00271     /* flags */
00272     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00273 }

00316 
00317 static int object_origin_clear_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00318 {
00319     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00320     float *v1, *v3;
00321     float mat[3][3];
00322 
00323     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) 
00324     {
00325         if (ob->parent) {
00326             /* vectors pointed to by v1 and v3 will get modified */
00327             v1= ob->loc;
00328             v3= ob->parentinv[3];
00329             
00330             copy_m3_m4(mat, ob->parentinv);
00331             negate_v3_v3(v3, v1);
00332             mul_m3_v3(mat, v3);
00333         }
00334 
00335         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00336     }
00337     CTX_DATA_END;
00338 
00339     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00340     
00341     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00342     
00343     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00344 }

00360 
00361 /*************************** Apply Transformation ****************************/
00362 
00363 /* use this when the loc/size/rot of the parent has changed but the children
00364  * should stay in the same place, e.g. for apply-size-rot or object center */
00365 static void ignore_parent_tx(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Object *ob ) 
00366 {
00367     Object workob;
00368     Object *ob_child;
00369     
00370     /* a change was made, adjust the children to compensate */
00371     for (ob_child=bmain->object.first; ob_child; ob_child=ob_child->id.next) {
00372         if (ob_child->parent == ob) {
00373             object_apply_mat4(ob_child, ob_child->obmat, TRUE, FALSE);
00374             what_does_parent(scene, ob_child, &workob);
00375             invert_m4_m4(ob_child->parentinv, workob.obmat);
00376         }
00377     }
00378 }
00379 
00380 static int apply_objects_internal(bContext *C, ReportList *reports, int apply_loc, int apply_rot, int apply_scale)
00381 {
00382     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00383     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00384     float rsmat[3][3], tmat[3][3], obmat[3][3], iobmat[3][3], mat[4][4], scale;
00385     int a, change = 0;
00386     
00387     /* first check if we can execute */
00388     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00389 
00390         if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
00391             if (ID_REAL_USERS(ob->data) > 1) {
00392                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't apply to a multi user mesh, doing nothing");
00393                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00394             }
00395         }
00396         else if (ob->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
00397             if (ID_REAL_USERS(ob->data) > 1) {
00398                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't apply to a multi user armature, doing nothing");
00399                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00400             }
00401         }
00402         else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
00403             if (ID_REAL_USERS(ob->data) > 1) {
00404                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't apply to a multi user lattice, doing nothing");
00405                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00406             }
00407         }
00408         else if (ELEM(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
00409             Curve *cu;
00410 
00411             if (ID_REAL_USERS(ob->data) > 1) {
00412                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't apply to a multi user curve, doing nothing");
00413                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00414             }
00415 
00416             cu= ob->data;
00417 
00418             if (!(cu->flag & CU_3D) && (apply_rot || apply_loc)) {
00419                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Neither rotation nor location could be applied to a 2d curve, doing nothing");
00420                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00421             }
00422             if (cu->key) {
00423                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't apply to a curve with vertex keys, doing nothing");
00424                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00425             }
00426         }
00427     }
00428     CTX_DATA_END;
00429     
00430     /* now execute */
00431     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00432 
00433         /* calculate rotation/scale matrix */
00434         if (apply_scale && apply_rot)
00435             object_to_mat3(ob, rsmat);
00436         else if (apply_scale)
00437             object_scale_to_mat3(ob, rsmat);
00438         else if (apply_rot) {
00439             float tmat[3][3], timat[3][3];
00440 
00441             /* simple rotation matrix */
00442             object_rot_to_mat3(ob, rsmat);
00443 
00444             /* correct for scale, note mul_m3_m3m3 has swapped args! */
00445             object_scale_to_mat3(ob, tmat);
00446             invert_m3_m3(timat, tmat);
00447             mul_m3_m3m3(rsmat, timat, rsmat);
00448             mul_m3_m3m3(rsmat, rsmat, tmat);
00449         }
00450         else
00451             unit_m3(rsmat);
00452 
00453         copy_m4_m3(mat, rsmat);
00454 
00455         /* calculate translation */
00456         if (apply_loc) {
00457             copy_v3_v3(mat[3], ob->loc);
00458 
00459             if (!(apply_scale && apply_rot)) {
00460                 /* correct for scale and rotation that is still applied */
00461                 object_to_mat3(ob, obmat);
00462                 invert_m3_m3(iobmat, obmat);
00463                 mul_m3_m3m3(tmat, rsmat, iobmat);
00464                 mul_m3_v3(tmat, mat[3]);
00465             }
00466         }
00467 
00468         /* apply to object data */
00469         if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
00470             Mesh *me= ob->data;
00471             MVert *mvert;
00472 
00473             multiresModifier_scale_disp(scene, ob);
00474             
00475             /* adjust data */
00476             mvert= me->mvert;
00477             for (a=0; a<me->totvert; a++, mvert++)
00478                 mul_m4_v3(mat, mvert->co);
00479             
00480             if (me->key) {
00481                 KeyBlock *kb;
00482                 
00483                 for (kb=me->key->block.first; kb; kb=kb->next) {
00484                     float *fp= kb->data;
00485                     
00486                     for (a=0; a<kb->totelem; a++, fp+=3)
00487                         mul_m4_v3(mat, fp);
00488                 }
00489             }
00490             
00491             /* update normals */
00492             mesh_calc_normals_mapping(me->mvert, me->totvert, me->mloop, me->mpoly, me->totloop, me->totpoly, NULL, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL);
00493         }
00494         else if (ob->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
00495             ED_armature_apply_transform(ob, mat);
00496         }
00497         else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
00498             Lattice *lt = ob->data;
00499             BPoint *bp = lt->def;
00500             int a = lt->pntsu * lt->pntsv * lt->pntsw;
00501             
00502             while (a--) {
00503                 mul_m4_v3(mat, bp->vec);
00504                 bp++;
00505             }
00506         }
00507         else if (ELEM(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
00508             Curve *cu= ob->data;
00509 
00510             Nurb *nu;
00511             BPoint *bp;
00512             BezTriple *bezt;
00513 
00514             scale = mat3_to_scale(rsmat);
00515 
00516             for (nu=cu->nurb.first; nu; nu=nu->next) {
00517                 if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00518                     a= nu->pntsu;
00519                     for (bezt= nu->bezt; a--; bezt++) {
00520                         mul_m4_v3(mat, bezt->vec[0]);
00521                         mul_m4_v3(mat, bezt->vec[1]);
00522                         mul_m4_v3(mat, bezt->vec[2]);
00523                         bezt->radius *= scale;
00524                     }
00525                     calchandlesNurb(nu);
00526                 }
00527                 else {
00528                     a= nu->pntsu*nu->pntsv;
00529                     for (bp= nu->bp; a--; bp++)
00530                         mul_m4_v3(mat, bp->vec);
00531                 }
00532             }
00533         }
00534         else
00535             continue;
00536 
00537         if (apply_loc)
00538             zero_v3(ob->loc);
00539         if (apply_scale)
00540             ob->size[0]= ob->size[1]= ob->size[2]= 1.0f;
00541         if (apply_rot) {
00542             zero_v3(ob->rot);
00543             unit_qt(ob->quat);
00544             unit_axis_angle(ob->rotAxis, &ob->rotAngle);
00545         }
00546 
00547         where_is_object(scene, ob);
00548         if (ob->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
00549             where_is_pose(scene, ob); /* needed for bone parents */
00550         }
00551 
00552         ignore_parent_tx(bmain, scene, ob);
00553 
00554         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA);
00555 
00556         change = 1;
00557     }
00558     CTX_DATA_END;
00559 
00560     if (!change)
00561         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00562 
00563     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00564     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00565 }
00566 
00567 static int visual_transform_apply_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00568 {
00569     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00570     int change = 0;
00571     
00572     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00573         where_is_object(scene, ob);
00574         object_apply_mat4(ob, ob->obmat, TRUE, TRUE);
00575         where_is_object(scene, ob);
00576 
00577         /* update for any children that may get moved */
00578         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00579     
00580         change = 1;
00581     }
00582     CTX_DATA_END;
00583 
00584     if (!change)
00585         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00586 
00587     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00588     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00589 }
00590 
00591 void OBJECT_OT_visual_transform_apply(wmOperatorType *ot)
00592 {
00593     /* identifiers */
00594     ot->name = "Apply Visual Transform";
00595     ot->description = "Apply the object's visual transformation to its data";
00596     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_visual_transform_apply";
00597     
00598     /* api callbacks */
00599     ot->exec = visual_transform_apply_exec;
00600     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00601     
00602     /* flags */
00603     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00604 }
00605 
00606 static int object_transform_apply_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00607 {
00608     const int loc= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "location");
00609     const int rot= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "rotation");
00610     const int sca= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "scale");
00611 
00612     if (loc || rot || sca) {
00613         return apply_objects_internal(C, op->reports, loc, rot, sca);
00614     }
00615     else {
00616         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00617     }
00618 }
00619 
00620 void OBJECT_OT_transform_apply(wmOperatorType *ot)
00621 {
00622     /* identifiers */
00623     ot->name = "Apply Object Transform";
00624     ot->description = "Apply the object's transformation to its data";
00625     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_transform_apply";
00626 
00627     /* api callbacks */
00628     ot->exec = object_transform_apply_exec;
00629     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
00630 
00631     /* flags */
00632     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00633 
00634     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "location", 0, "Location", "");
00635     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "rotation", 0, "Rotation", "");
00636     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "scale", 0, "Scale", "");
00637 }
00638 
00639 /********************* Set Object Center ************************/
00640 
00641 enum {
00642     GEOMETRY_TO_ORIGIN=0,
00643     ORIGIN_TO_GEOMETRY,
00644     ORIGIN_TO_CURSOR
00645 };
00646 
00647 static int object_origin_set_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00648 {
00649     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00650     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00651     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00652     Object *tob;
00653     float cursor[3], cent[3], cent_neg[3], centn[3], min[3], max[3];
00654     int centermode = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00655     int around = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "center"); /* initialized from v3d->around */
00656 
00657     /* keep track of what is changed */
00658     int tot_change=0, tot_lib_error=0, tot_multiuser_arm_error=0;
00659 
00660     if (obedit && centermode != GEOMETRY_TO_ORIGIN) {
00661         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Operation cannot be performed in EditMode");
00662         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00663     }
00664     else {
00665         /* get the view settings if 'around' isn't set and the view is available */
00666         View3D *v3d= CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00667         copy_v3_v3(cursor, give_cursor(scene, v3d));
00668         if (v3d && !RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "center"))
00669             around= v3d->around;
00670     }
00671 
00672     zero_v3(cent);
00673 
00674     if (obedit) {
00675         INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
00676 
00677         if (obedit->type==OB_MESH) {
00678             Mesh *me= obedit->data;
00679             BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00680             BMVert *eve;
00681             BMIter iter;
00682             int total = 0;
00683             
00684             if (centermode == ORIGIN_TO_CURSOR) {
00685                 copy_v3_v3(cent, cursor);
00686                 invert_m4_m4(obedit->imat, obedit->obmat);
00687                 mul_m4_v3(obedit->imat, cent);
00688             }
00689             else {
00690                 BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00691                     if (around==V3D_CENTROID) {
00692                         total++;
00693                         add_v3_v3(cent, eve->co);
00694                         mul_v3_fl(cent, 1.0f/(float)total);
00695                     }
00696                     else {
00697                         DO_MINMAX(eve->co, min, max);
00698                         mid_v3_v3v3(cent, min, max);
00699                     }
00700                 }
00701             }
00702             
00703             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00704                 sub_v3_v3(eve->co, cent);
00705             }
00706 
00707             EDBM_mesh_normals_update(em);
00708             tot_change++;
00709             DAG_id_tag_update(&obedit->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00710         }
00711     }
00712 
00713     /* reset flags */
00714     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00715             ob->flag &= ~OB_DONE;
00716     }
00717     CTX_DATA_END;
00718 
00719     for (tob= bmain->object.first; tob; tob= tob->id.next) {
00720         if (tob->data)
00721             ((ID *)tob->data)->flag &= ~LIB_DOIT;
00722         if (tob->dup_group)
00723             ((ID *)tob->dup_group)->flag &= ~LIB_DOIT;
00724     }
00725 
00726     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00727         if ((ob->flag & OB_DONE)==0) {
00728             int do_inverse_offset = FALSE;
00729             ob->flag |= OB_DONE;
00730 
00731             if (centermode == ORIGIN_TO_CURSOR) {
00732                 copy_v3_v3(cent, cursor);
00733                 invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
00734                 mul_m4_v3(ob->imat, cent);
00735             }
00736             
00737             if (ob->data == NULL) {
00738                 /* special support for dupligroups */
00739                 if ((ob->transflag & OB_DUPLIGROUP) && ob->dup_group && (ob->dup_group->id.flag & LIB_DOIT)==0) {
00740                     if (ob->dup_group->id.lib) {
00741                         tot_lib_error++;
00742                     }
00743                     else {
00744                         if (centermode == ORIGIN_TO_CURSOR) { /* done */ }
00745                         else {
00746                             /* only bounds support */
00747                             INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
00748                             minmax_object_duplis(scene, ob, min, max);
00749                             mid_v3_v3v3(cent, min, max);
00750                             invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
00751                             mul_m4_v3(ob->imat, cent);
00752                         }
00753                         
00754                         add_v3_v3(ob->dup_group->dupli_ofs, cent);
00755 
00756                         tot_change++;
00757                         ob->dup_group->id.flag |= LIB_DOIT;
00758                         do_inverse_offset= TRUE;
00759                     }
00760                 }
00761             }
00762             else if (((ID *)ob->data)->lib) {
00763                 tot_lib_error++;
00764             }
00765 
00766             if (obedit==NULL && ob->type==OB_MESH) {
00767                 Mesh *me= ob->data;
00768 
00769                 if (centermode == ORIGIN_TO_CURSOR) { /* done */ }
00770                 else if (around==V3D_CENTROID) { mesh_center_median(me, cent); }
00771                 else { mesh_center_bounds(me, cent); }
00772 
00773                 negate_v3_v3(cent_neg, cent);
00774                 mesh_translate(me, cent_neg, 1);
00775 
00776                 tot_change++;
00777                 me->id.flag |= LIB_DOIT;
00778                 do_inverse_offset= TRUE;
00779             }
00780             else if (ELEM(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
00781                 Curve *cu= ob->data;
00782 
00783                 if (centermode == ORIGIN_TO_CURSOR) { /* done */ }
00784                 else if (around==V3D_CENTROID) { curve_center_median(cu, cent); }
00785                 else { curve_center_bounds(cu, cent);   }
00786 
00787                 /* don't allow Z change if curve is 2D */
00788                 if ((ob->type == OB_CURVE) && !(cu->flag & CU_3D))
00789                     cent[2] = 0.0;
00790 
00791                 negate_v3_v3(cent_neg, cent);
00792                 curve_translate(cu, cent_neg, 1);
00793 
00794                 tot_change++;
00795                 cu->id.flag |= LIB_DOIT;
00796                 do_inverse_offset= TRUE;
00797 
00798                 if (obedit) {
00799                     if (centermode == GEOMETRY_TO_ORIGIN) {
00800                         DAG_id_tag_update(&obedit->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00801                     }
00802                     break;
00803                 }
00804             }
00805             else if (ob->type==OB_FONT) {
00806                 /* get from bb */
00807 
00808                 Curve *cu= ob->data;
00809 
00810                 if (cu->bb==NULL && (centermode != ORIGIN_TO_CURSOR)) {
00811                     /* do nothing*/
00812                 }
00813                 else {
00814                     if (centermode == ORIGIN_TO_CURSOR) {
00815                         /* done */
00816                     }
00817                     else {
00818                         cent[0]= 0.5f * ( cu->bb->vec[4][0] + cu->bb->vec[0][0]);
00819                         cent[1]= 0.5f * ( cu->bb->vec[0][1] + cu->bb->vec[2][1]) - 0.5f;    /* extra 0.5 is the height o above line */
00820                     }
00821 
00822                     cent[2]= 0.0f;
00823 
00824                     cu->xof= cu->xof - (cent[0] / cu->fsize);
00825                     cu->yof= cu->yof - (cent[1] / cu->fsize);
00826 
00827                     tot_change++;
00828                     cu->id.flag |= LIB_DOIT;
00829                     do_inverse_offset= TRUE;
00830                 }
00831             }
00832             else if (ob->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
00833                 bArmature *arm = ob->data;
00834 
00835                 if (ID_REAL_USERS(arm) > 1) {
00836 #if 0
00837                     BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't apply to a multi user armature");
00838                     return;
00839 #endif
00840                     tot_multiuser_arm_error++;
00841                 }
00842                 else {
00843                     /* Function to recenter armatures in editarmature.c
00844                      * Bone + object locations are handled there.
00845                      */
00846                     docenter_armature(scene, ob, cursor, centermode, around);
00847 
00848                     tot_change++;
00849                     arm->id.flag |= LIB_DOIT;
00850                     /* do_inverse_offset= TRUE; */ /* docenter_armature() handles this */
00851 
00852                     where_is_object(scene, ob);
00853                     where_is_pose(scene, ob); /* needed for bone parents */
00854 
00855                     ignore_parent_tx(bmain, scene, ob);
00856 
00857                     if (obedit)
00858                         break;
00859                 }
00860             }
00861             else if (ob->type == OB_MBALL) {
00862                 MetaBall *mb = ob->data;
00863 
00864                 if (centermode == ORIGIN_TO_CURSOR) { /* done */ }
00865                 else if (around==V3D_CENTROID) { BKE_metaball_center_median(mb, cent); }
00866                 else { BKE_metaball_center_bounds(mb, cent);    }
00867 
00868                 negate_v3_v3(cent_neg, cent);
00869                 BKE_metaball_translate(mb, cent_neg);
00870 
00871                 tot_change++;
00872                 mb->id.flag |= LIB_DOIT;
00873                 do_inverse_offset= TRUE;
00874 
00875                 if (obedit) {
00876                     if (centermode == GEOMETRY_TO_ORIGIN) {
00877                         DAG_id_tag_update(&obedit->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00878                     }
00879                     break;
00880                 }
00881             }
00882 
00883             /* offset other selected objects */
00884             if (do_inverse_offset && (centermode != GEOMETRY_TO_ORIGIN)) {
00885                 /* was the object data modified
00886                  * note: the functions above must set 'cent' */
00887                 copy_v3_v3(centn, cent);
00888                 mul_mat3_m4_v3(ob->obmat, centn); /* ommit translation part */
00889                 add_v3_v3(ob->loc, centn);
00890 
00891                 where_is_object(scene, ob);
00892                 if (ob->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
00893                     where_is_pose(scene, ob); /* needed for bone parents */
00894                 }
00895 
00896                 ignore_parent_tx(bmain, scene, ob);
00897                 
00898                 /* other users? */
00899                 CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob_other, selected_editable_objects) {
00900                     if (        (ob_other->flag & OB_DONE)==0 &&
00901                             (   (ob->data && (ob->data == ob_other->data)) ||
00902                                 (ob->dup_group==ob_other->dup_group && (ob->transflag|ob_other->transflag) & OB_DUPLIGROUP) )
00903                     ) {
00904                         ob_other->flag |= OB_DONE;
00905                         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob_other->id, OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA);
00906 
00907                         copy_v3_v3(centn, cent);
00908                         mul_mat3_m4_v3(ob_other->obmat, centn); /* ommit translation part */
00909                         add_v3_v3(ob_other->loc, centn);
00910 
00911                         where_is_object(scene, ob_other);
00912                         if (ob_other->type==OB_ARMATURE) {
00913                             where_is_pose(scene, ob_other); /* needed for bone parents */
00914                         }
00915                         ignore_parent_tx(bmain, scene, ob_other);
00916                     }
00917                 }
00918                 CTX_DATA_END;
00919             }
00920         }
00921     }
00922     CTX_DATA_END;
00923 
00924     for (tob= bmain->object.first; tob; tob= tob->id.next)
00925         if (tob->data && (((ID *)tob->data)->flag & LIB_DOIT))
00926             DAG_id_tag_update(&tob->id, OB_RECALC_OB|OB_RECALC_DATA);
00927 
00928     if (tot_change) {
00929         DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00930         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00931     }
00932 
00933     /* Warn if any errors occurred */
00934     if (tot_lib_error+tot_multiuser_arm_error) {
00935         BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, "%i Object(s) Not Centered, %i Changed:",tot_lib_error+tot_multiuser_arm_error, tot_change);
00936         if (tot_lib_error)
00937             BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, "|%i linked library objects",tot_lib_error);
00938         if (tot_multiuser_arm_error)
00939             BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, "|%i multiuser armature object(s)",tot_multiuser_arm_error);
00940     }
00941 
00942     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00943 }
00944 
00945 void OBJECT_OT_origin_set(wmOperatorType *ot)
00946 {
00947     static EnumPropertyItem prop_set_center_types[] = {
00948         {GEOMETRY_TO_ORIGIN, "GEOMETRY_ORIGIN", 0, "Geometry to Origin", "Move object geometry to object origin"},
00949         {ORIGIN_TO_GEOMETRY, "ORIGIN_GEOMETRY", 0, "Origin to Geometry", "Move object origin to center of object geometry"},
00950         {ORIGIN_TO_CURSOR, "ORIGIN_CURSOR", 0, "Origin to 3D Cursor", "Move object origin to position of the 3d cursor"},
00951         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00952     };
00953     
00954     static EnumPropertyItem prop_set_bounds_types[] = {
00955         {V3D_CENTROID, "MEDIAN", 0, "Median Center", ""},
00956         {V3D_CENTER, "BOUNDS", 0, "Bounds Center", ""},
00957         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00958     };
00959     
00960     /* identifiers */
00961     ot->name = "Set Origin";
00962     ot->description = "Set the object's origin, by either moving the data, or set to center of data, or use 3d cursor";
00963     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_origin_set";
00964     
00965     /* api callbacks */
00966     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
00967     ot->exec = object_origin_set_exec;
00968     
00969     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00970     
00971     /* flags */
00972     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00973     
00974     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", prop_set_center_types, 0, "Type", "");
00975     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "center", prop_set_bounds_types, V3D_CENTROID, "Center", "");
00976 }
